name: none
detail: none

name: Brew of greater DMG
detail: Drink to gain +3 Dmg to your next damage roll.

name: Gold pieces
detail: A small bag filled with gold coins.

name: Brew of greater DEF
detail: Drink to gain +3 Def on a monsters next damage roll.

name: Brew of greater STR
detail: Drink to gain +10 Str to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Brew of greater DEX
detail: Drink to gain +10 Dex to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Objective item
detail: An “Objective item” is found that may be required for a quest (check the current quest’s details). If it’s not needed for the quest, it is instead a “Great item” worth 150gp.

name: Brew of greater INT
detail: Drink to gain +10 Int to your next d100 dice roll.

name: greater armour
detail: Roll on table A – armour and add “greater” before its name, it gains +0.4 Def.

name: greater weapon
detail: Roll on table W – weapon and add “greater” before its name, add +2 to its Dmg.

name: potion of greater remove poison
detail: Drink to remove up to 6 shaded pips on the poison track.

name: potion of greater healing
detail: Drink to restore up to 12 lost HP.

name: Gold pieces
detail: A small bag filled with gold coins.

name: potion of greater STR
detail: Drink to gain +10 Str until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: potion of greater DEX
detail: Drink to gain +10 Dex until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: potion of greater INT
detail: Drink to gain +10 Int until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: potion of greater cure disease
detail: Drink to remove up to 6 shaded pips on the disease track.

name: Elixir of greater fate
detail: Drink to gain 2 fate points.

name: Gold pieces
detail: A small bag filled with gold coins.

name: Elixir of greater health
detail: Drink to gain 2 point of primary HP.

name: Spell book
detail: You find a damaged book that contains a spell written inside, roll once on table S – Spells and add the result to the spell book.

name: Elixir of greater STR
detail: Drink to gain 3 points of primary Str.

name: Elixir of greater DEX
detail: Drink to gain 3 points of primary Dex.

name: Elixir of greater INT
detail: Drink to gain 3 points of primary Int.

name: Potion of greater fate
detail: Drink to add +60 to a result when rolling on the next table.

name: Elixir of greater life
detail: Drink to gain 3 life points.

name: Superior treasure
detail: A much superior treasure is found, roll on table TC – Treasure C.

name: Legendary Ring
detail: Roll on table L for its legend (ring slot) and value.

name: Legendary Necklace
detail: Roll on table L for its legend (neck slot) and value.

name: Legendary weapon
detail: Roll on table W for a weapon and then on table L for its legend and value.
